Below are GitHub links for the code developed during the 2020 and 2021 Infinite Recharge seasons.

2021 Infinite Recharge Robot - Paradox2102/2021-Infinite-Recharge-at-Home (github.com)

2021 AI Camera for ball tracking - Paradox2102/AI-Camera (github.com)

2020 Final Code - Paradox2102/Layout-2020-Code (github.com)

Offseason 2021 Swerve Drive - Paradox2102/2021-Swerve-Drive: Code for the summer swerve drive robot 2021. (github.com)

Paradox2102/t265: Code to run Intel RealSense T265 SLAM camera on Raspberry Pi (github.com)
